guide.introduction_rendered:
Relevant parts
  • Rubber band
  • Bic Mechanical Pencil
  • Paper clip
  • Unlimited Ammunition
Tools
  • Hot Glue gun & hot glue
  • Scissors

lines.text: Get a mechanical pencil.
lines.text_raw: Get a mechanical pencil.

lines.text: Disassemble the pencil.
lines.text_raw: Disassemble the pencil.

lines.text: Set up the inside and outside pieces side-by-side, having the back touch as shown.
lines.text_raw: Set up the inside and outside pieces side-by-side, having the back touch as shown.

lines.text: Mark the end of the outer piece, just leaving some space for the the inner piece to stick out.
lines.text_raw: Mark the end of the outer piece, just leaving some space for the the inner piece to stick out.

lines.text: Cut on the marked line.
lines.text_raw: Cut on the marked line.

lines.text: Set up the action.
lines.text_raw: Set up the action.

lines.text: Bend the paperclip into a hook.
lines.text_raw: Bend the paperclip into a hook.

lines.text: Attach the rubber band to the hook and twist the hook to close it.
lines.text_raw: Attach the rubber band to the hook and twist the hook to close it.

lines.text: Place the hook (action) into the wide-end hole of the smaller piece.
lines.text_raw: Place the hook (action) into the wide-end hole of the smaller piece.

lines.text: Push the action farther into the hole.
lines.text_raw: Push the action farther into the hole.

lines.text: Hot glue the action.
lines.text_raw: Hot glue the action.

lines.text: Get the tip of the pencil.
lines.text_raw: Get the tip of the pencil.

lines.text: Set it up touching the outside piece, towards the cut end of the shooter.
lines.text_raw: Set it up touching the outside piece, towards the cut end of the shooter.

lines.text: Hot glue it there.
lines.text_raw: Hot glue it there.

lines.text: Place the action (the inner piece) into the larger "barrel."
lines.text_raw: Place the action (the inner piece) into the larger "barrel."

lines.text: Pull the rubber band over the glued-on tip.
lines.text_raw: Pull the rubber band over the glued-on tip.

lines.text: This is your final product!
lines.text_raw: This is your final product!

lines.text: To load and fire the gun:
lines.text_raw: To load and fire the gun:

lines.text: Take the back of the action and pull it back. Hold.
lines.text_raw: Take the back of the action and pull it back. Hold.

lines.text: Load the ammunition directly into the barrel.
lines.text_raw: Load the ammunition directly into the barrel.

lines.text: Tip up the shooter so the ammo falls back into the barrel, touching the action.
lines.text_raw: Tip up the shooter so the ammo falls back into the barrel, touching the action.

lines.text: Now, brace the shooter (you might need 2 hands) and let go!
lines.text_raw: Now, brace the shooter (you might need 2 hands) and let go!

lines.text: Sucessful fire!
lines.text_raw: Sucessful fire!

guide.summary: Transform an ordinary mechanical pencil into a tinfoil / paper / anything-that-fits launching mechanism.
